Key Match Events: The Nets lost to the Celtics by a score of 108-104 in overtime.
Pre-Game Insights: The Nets are 4-5 in their first nine games.
Post-Match Reflections: The Nets will play their next game on Saturday evening when they visit the Cleveland Cavaliers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ben Simmons is in his fourth season as a member of the Nets.
Others: Ben Simmons finished with eight points, seven rebounds, eight assists and one steal while shooting 4/6 from the field in 27 minutes of playing time.
